   19: %%
   20: -module(config_func_error_1_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,{seconds,5}}].
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   35: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   36: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   37: %% Reason = term()
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   44: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   47:     ok.
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   51: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   52: %% GroupName = atom()
   53: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   54: %% Reason = term()
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   61: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   62: %% GroupName = atom()
   63: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   70: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   71: %% TestCase = atom()
   72: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   73: %% Reason = term()
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: bad_proc(Config) ->    
   76:     ct:pal("Bye bye from ~p", [self()]),
   77:     %% this call will either generate an exit immediately
   78:     %% or return a fun to be executed here
   79:     ErrorFun = ct_test_support:random_error(Config),
   80:     ct:log("Calling error fun now...", []),
   81:     ErrorFun(),
   82:     ct:sleep(10000),
   83:     ok.
   84: 
   85: init_per_testcase(exit_in_iptc, Config) ->
   86:     spawn_link(?MODULE, bad_proc, [Config]),
   87:     ct:sleep(10000),
   88:     Config;
   89: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   90:     Config.
   91: 
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   94: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   95: %% TestCase = atom()
   96: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   97: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   98: end_per_testcase(exit_in_eptc, Config) ->
   99:     spawn_link(?MODULE, bad_proc, [Config]),
  100:     ct:sleep(10000),
  101:     ok;
  102: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  103:     ok.
  104: 
  105: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  106: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
  107: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  108: %% GroupName = atom()
  109: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  110: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  111: %% TestCase = atom()
  112: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  113: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  114: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  115: %% N = integer() | forever
  116: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  117: groups() ->
  118:     [{g1, [], [exit_in_iptc]},
  119:      {g2, [], [exit_in_eptc]}].
  120: 
  121: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  122: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  123: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  124: %% GroupName = atom()
  125: %% TestCase = atom()
  126: %% Reason = term()
  127: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  128: all() -> 
  129:     [exit_in_iptc,
  130:      exit_in_eptc,
  131:      {group, g1},
  132:      {group, g2}].
  133: 
  134: exit_in_iptc(_) ->
  135:     ok.
  136: 
  137: exit_in_eptc(_) ->
  138:     ok.
  139:
